Uses of Class
exception.WrongStatusException

  • Packages that use WrongStatusException 
    Package Description
    client.remoteController
    Contains the classes used to send messages to the server
    commons
    Contains all different classes that are common between server and client
    controller
    Contains all the different controllers, the main logic of the game is here
    server.RMIHandler
    Contains all the classes to manage the RMI connections

    • Uses of WrongStatusException in controller

      Methods in controller that throw WrongStatusException 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void MatchController.buildMap​(int mapID)
      This method creates the map
      void MatchController.grabAmmoCard()
      This method is used to grab an ammoCard
      void MatchController.grabWeapon​(Weapon weapon, int indexOfWeaponToSwap)
      This method is used to grab a weapon
      void MatchController.makeAction1Frenzy​(Square destination, ShootingParametersInput input, Player player)
      This method makes the action 1 Frenzy Boosted (move + reload + shoot)
      void MatchController.makeAction1FrenzyLower​(Square destination, ShootingParametersInput input, Player player)
      This method makes the action 1 Frenzy Lower (move + move + reload + shoot)
      void MatchController.makeAction2Frenzy​(Square destination, Player player)
      This method makes the action 2 Frenzy Boosted (move + move + move + move)
      void MatchController.makeAction2FrenzyLower​(Square destination, int numbOfWeaponToGrab, Player player, int indexOfWeaponToSwap)
      This method makes the action 2 Frenzy Lower (move + move + move + grab)
      void MatchController.makeAction3Frenzy​(Square destination, int numbOfWeaponToGrab, Player player, int indexOfWeaponToSwap)
      This method makes the action 3 Frenzy Boosted (move + move + grab)
      void MatchController.move​(Player player, Square destination, int maxDistanceAllowed)
      +This method makes the move
      void MatchController.reloadWeapon​(Weapon weapon)
      This method is used to reload weapon
      void MatchController.shoot​(ShootingParametersInput input)
      This method make the action shoot
      void MatchController.skipAction​(Player p)
      This method is helpful to skip an action
      void MatchController.skipActionFrenzy​(Player p)  
      void MatchController.spawn​(PowerUp powerUpChosen, Player user)
      This method make the spawn
      void MatchController.useNewton​(PowerUp newton, Player affectedPlayer, Square destination)
      Trough this method you can use the newton
      void MatchController.useTagbackGrenade​(PowerUp tagbackGrenade, Player user, Player affectedPlayer)
      Trough this method you can use the tag back grenade
      void MatchController.useTargetingScope​(PowerUp targetingScope, Player affectedPlayer, Color ammoToPay)
      Trough this method you can use the targeting scope
      void MatchController.useTeleporter​(PowerUp teleporter, Square destination)
      Trough this method you can use the teleporter

    • Uses of WrongStatusException in server.RMIHandler

      Methods in server.RMIHandler that throw WrongStatusException 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void ServerControllerRMI.buildMap​(int mapID, int clientHashedID)
      This method when called asks the match controller do build the map of the specific ID
      void ServerControllerRMI.grabAmmoCard​(int xDestination, int yDestination, int clientHashedID)
      This method is called by a client when a player wants to grab an ammo card from a specific location
      void ServerControllerRMI.grabWeapon​(int xDestination, int yDestination, int indexOfWeapon, int clientHashedID, int indexOfWeaponToSwap)
      This method is called by a client when he wants to grab a weapon froma specific location
      void ServerControllerRMI.makeAction1Frenzy​(int posX, int posY, ShootingParametersClient input, int clientHashedID)
      This method is used by a player when he wants to perform a franzy action.
      void ServerControllerRMI.makeAction1FrenzyLower​(int posX, int posY, ShootingParametersClient input, int clientHashedID)
      This method is used to make the action Shoot but with 2 moves (action1 frenzy allows to make 1 move)
      void ServerControllerRMI.makeAction2Frenzy​(int posX, int posY, int clientHashedID)
      This method embodies the controls and actions to realize the second action in frenzy mode.
      void ServerControllerRMI.makeAction2FrenzyLower​(int posX, int posY, int numbOfWeaponToGrab, int clientHashedID, int indexOfWeaponToSwap)
      With this method you can perform the grab with 3 of maximum distance of move
      void ServerControllerRMI.makeAction3Frenzy​(int posX, int posY, int numbOfWeaponToGrab, int clientHashedID, int indexOfWeaponToSwap)
      This method allows you to make the action where you move up to 2 squares and the grab
      void ServerControllerRMI.move​(int iDestination, int jDestination, int clientHashedID)
      This method is called when a player wants to make a move in the game It delegates to matchController the actual move
      void ServerControllerRMI.reload​(int indexOfWeapon, int clientHashedID)
      This method is called whenever a client has to reload his weapons (if allowed to)
      void ServerControllerRMI.shoot​(ShootingParametersClient input, int clientHashedID)
      This method is used whenever a user wants to make the shoot action in the game
      void ServerControllerRMI.skipAction​(int clientHashedID)
      This method is called by an active client when he wants to skip an action
      void ServerControllerRMI.skipActionFrenzy​(int clientHashedID)
      This method is similar to skipAction but it's used during the frenzy mode, has different paramenters on status controls
      void ServerControllerRMI.spawn​(int powerUpID, int clientHashedID)
      this method is called from a client whenever he has to spawn
      void ServerControllerRMI.useNewton​(int indexOfPowerUp, java.lang.String affectedPlayer, int xDest, int yDest, int clientHashedID)
      useNewton is called when a newton powerUp has to be used
      void ServerControllerRMI.useTagBackGrenade​(int indexOfTagBackGrenade, java.lang.String user, java.lang.String affectedPlayer, int clientHashedID)
      This method is called when a player wants to use the TagbackGrenade powerUp
      void ServerControllerRMI.useTargetingScope​(int indexOfTargetingScope, java.lang.String affectedPlayer, int clientHashedID, Color ammoColorToPay)
      This method is used when a Player wats to use a TargetingScope
      void ServerControllerRMI.useTeleporter​(int indexOfPowerUp, int xDest, int yDest, int clientHashedID)
      useTeleporter is called when a teleporter powerUp has to be used
